variants.Description in input context: G309D mutation shows modest effects on PINK1 stability and kinase activity.
L347P mutation significantly destabilizes PINK1 and reduces kinase activity.

Material used.Description: Wild-type and mutant PINK1 constructs were expressed in mammalian cells for kinase activity analysis.

Readout description.Result Description: G309D showed a 20-30% reduction in kinase activity compared to wild-type.
L347P showed a >70% reduction in kinase activity compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for comparing wild-type vs. mutant groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Source: Custom (based on standard functional assays for kinases)

Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: Custom (based on standard functional assays for kinases)

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Mammalian cell expression with fluorescent tagging

Material used.Description: PINK1 constructs were tagged with myc or GFP for localization studies.

Readout description.Result Description: L347P showed significantly lower PINK1 protein levels compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for protein stability analysis.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for comparing wild-type vs. mutant groups.

Material used.Description: Homology models were generated to predict structural changes in PINK1 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: G309D showed limited structural perturbations in homology models.
L347P showed major conformational changes in homology models.

Biological replicates.Description: No biological replicates were performed for computational modeling.

Technical replicates.Description: No technical replicates were performed for computational modeling.

Basic positive control.Description: No control was explicitly mentioned for computational modeling.

Basic negative control.Description: No control was explicitly mentioned for computational modeling.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: No statistical analysis was explicitly mentioned for homology modeling.

Threshold for normal readout.Source: Custom (based on standard homology modeling practices)

Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: Custom (based on standard homology modeling practices)
